events.name: Lithium Nickel Cobalt Aluminium Oxides (NCA)
events.wd_description: Lithium nickel cobalt aluminium oxides (NCA) are a group of mixed metal oxides used as active materials in the positive electrode (cathode) of lithium-ion batteries. NCA batteries are utilized in electric cars and electric appliances due to their high voltage range and specific composition.
events.description: Lithium nickel cobalt aluminium oxides (NCA) are a group of mixed metal oxides used as active materials in the positive electrode (cathode) of lithium-ion batteries. NCA batteries are utilized in electric cars and electric appliances due to their high voltage range and specific composition.

events.name: Structure and Formula
events.wd_description: NCA materials are composed of lithium, nickel, cobalt, and aluminium with the general formula LiNixCoyAlzO2, where x + y + z = 1. A typical composition for market-available NCA batteries is LiNi0.84Co0.12Al0.04O2.
events.description: NCA materials are composed of lithium, nickel, cobalt, and aluminium with the general formula LiNixCoyAlzO2, where x + y + z = 1. A typical composition for market-available NCA batteries is LiNi0.84Co0.12Al0.04O2.

events.name: Applications and Voltage Range
events.wd_description: NCA batteries are used in electric cars and electric appliances. They operate within a voltage range of 3.6 V to 4.0 V, with a nominal voltage of 3.6 V or 3.7 V.
events.description: NCA batteries are used in electric cars and electric appliances. They operate within a voltage range of 3.6 V to 4.0 V, with a nominal voltage of 3.6 V or 3.7 V.

events.name: ctric Cars
events.wd_description: NCA batteries are widely used in electric cars due to their high energy density and voltage range.
events.description: NCA batteries are widely used in electric cars due to their high energy density and voltage range.

events.name: ctric Appliances
events.wd_description: NCA batteries are also used in various electric appliances, providing efficient power storage and delivery.
events.description: NCA batteries are also used in various electric appliances, providing efficient power storage and delivery.

events.name: Voltage Range
events.description: NCA batteries have a voltage range between 3.6 V and 4.0 V, with a nominal voltage of 3.6 V or 3.7 V.

events.name: Formula
events.description: The general formula for NCA compounds is LiNixCoyAlzO2 with x + y + z = 1. A common version used in the market is LiNi0.84Co0.12Al0.04O2.
